channel.title: What to do next?
channel.description:
Here's what I've done: -Downloaded and Installed JDK 6 Update 14 -Forwarded a port (PFPortChecker says it's open) -I made a No-IP thing and downloaded the DUC (also checked the box) -Downloaded a Base -Downloaded a Client -change compile.bat into: [code]@echo off Title Compiler javac -cp *.java pause [/code] -changed runserver.bat into: [code]@echo off
java -Xmx800M server
pause [/code] Changed environmenal variables: Classpath into: [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code] PATH into: [code];C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;.[/code]
What should I do next to be albe to play on my own server?

item.title: What to do next?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Start up ‘runserver.bat’ and click login with localhost or 127.0.0.1 set as the IP.

Read full topic

item.title: What to do next?
item.dc:creator: @nylls nylls
item.description:
@nylls wrote:

Here’s what I’ve done:
-Downloaded and Installed JDK 6 Update 14
-Forwarded a port (PFPortChecker says it’s open)
-I made a No-IP thing and downloaded the DUC (also checked the box)
-Downloaded a Base
-Downloaded a Client
-change compile.bat into:

@echo off Title Compiler javac -cp *.java pause
-changed runserver.bat into:

[code]@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause
[/code]
Changed environmenal variables:
Classpath into:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

PATH into:

;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;.

What should I do next to be albe to play on my own server?

Read full topic
